name: distancing (itch)
description:
limit the spread of infection by enforcing distancing

press 1, 2 or 3 to enforce distancing in blue, purple or pink populations

a game made for the isolate together jam in 48 hours
(with a couple of bug fixes after the deadline)

Music - Solace by Nomyn https://soundcloud.com/nomyn
